caption.center: GEORGE A. DELORIER Appellant v. STATE OF MISSOURI Respondent.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court of Platte County, Missouri, Honorable Owens L. Hull, Jr., Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
John M. Schilmoeller, Kansas City, MO, for Appellant.
Andrea K. Spillars, Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon and Andrea M. Follett, Jefferson City, MO, for Respondent.
opinion.panel: Before: Lisa White Hardwick, P.J., Paul M. Spinden and Thomas H. Newton, JJ.Page 456
opinion.opinion_text:
Mr. George A. Delorier appeals the denial of his Rule 24.035 motion for postconviction relief after an evidentiary hearing.
For the reasons set forth in the memorandum provided to the parties, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
